verses.verse: And there shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> a rod <S%H2415><s%> out of the stem <S%H1503><s%> of Jesse <S%H3448><s%>, and a Branch <S%H5342><s%> shall grow <S%H6509><s%> out of his roots <S%H8328><s%>:

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall rest <S%H5117><s%> upon him <S%H7307><s%>, the spirit of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and understanding <S%H998><s%>, the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of counsel <S%H6098><s%> and might <S%H1369><s%>, the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> and of the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>;

And shall make him of quick understanding <S%H7306><s%> in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and he shall not judge <S%H8199><s%> after the sight <S%H4758><s%> of his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, neither reprove <S%H3198><s%> after the hearing <S%H4926><s%> of his ears <S%H241><s%>:

But with righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall he judge <S%H8199><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%>, and reprove <S%H3198><s%> with equity <S%H4334><s%> for the meek <S%H6035><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: and he shall strike <S%H5221><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with the rod <S%H7626><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and with the breath <S%H7307><s%> of his lips <S%H8193><s%> shall he kill <S%H4191><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
And righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall be the belt <S%H232><s%> of his body <S%H4975><s%>, and faithfulness <S%H530><s%> the belt <S%H232><s%> of his mind <S%H2504><s%>.

The wolf <S%H2061><s%> also shall live <S%H1481><s%> with the lamb <S%H3532><s%>, and the leopard <S%H5246><s%> shall lie down <S%H7257><s%> with the kid <S%H1423><s%>; and the calf <S%H5695><s%> and the young lion <S%H3715><s%> and the fatling <S%H4806><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>; and a little <S%H6996><s%> child <S%H5288><s%> shall lead them <S%H5090><s%>.

And the cow <S%H6510><s%> and the bear <S%H1677><s%> shall feed <S%H7462><s%>; their young ones <S%H3206><s%> shall lie down <S%H7257><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>: and the lion <S%H738><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> like the ox <S%H1241><s%>.

And the sucking child <S%H3243><s%> shall play <S%H8173><s%> on the hole <S%H2352><s%> of the asp <S%H6620><s%>, and the weaned child <S%H1580><s%> shall put <S%H1911><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> on the cockatrice <S%H6848><s%>' den <S%H3975><s%>.

They shall not hurt <S%H7489><s%> nor destroy <S%H7843><s%> in all my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>: for the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of the knowledge <S%H1844><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, as the waters <S%H4325><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And in that day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a root <S%H8328><s%> of Jesse <S%H3448><s%>, which shall stand <S%H5975><s%> for a ensign <S%H5251><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; to it shall the Nations <S%H1471><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%>: and his rest <S%H4496><s%> shall be glorious <S%H3519><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that the Lord <S%H136><s%> shall set <S%H3254><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> the second time <S%H8145><s%> to recover <S%H7069><s%> the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, which shall be left <S%H7604><s%>, from Assyria <S%H804><s%>, and from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and from Pathros <S%H6624><s%>, and from Cush <S%H3568><s%>, and from Elam <S%H5867><s%>, and from Shinar <S%H8152><s%>, and from Hamath <S%H2574><s%>, and from the islands <S%H339><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And he shall set up <S%H5375><s%> a ensign <S%H5251><s%> for the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and shall assemble <S%H622><s%> the outcasts <S%H1760><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and gather together <S%H6908><s%> the dispersed <S%H5310><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> from the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H3671><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

The envy <S%H7068><s%> also of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%>, and the adversaries <S%H6887><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%>: Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall not envy <S%H7065><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall not trouble <S%H6887><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>.

But they shall fly <S%H5774><s%> upon the shoulders <S%H3802><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> toward the west <S%H3220><s%>; they shall plunder <S%H962><s%> them <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>: they shall lay <S%H4916><s%> their hand <S%H3027><s%> upon Edom <S%H123><s%> and Moab <S%H4124><s%>; and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> shall obey them <S%H4928><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the Egyptian <S%H4714><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>; and with his mighty <S%H5868><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> shall he shake <S%H5130><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> over the river <S%H5104><s%>, and shall strike <S%H5221><s%> it into seven <S%H7651><s%> streams <S%H5158><s%>, and make men go over <S%H1869><s%> dryshod <S%H5275><s%>.

And there shall be a highway <S%H4546><s%> for the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, which <S%H834><s%> shall be left <S%H7604><s%>, from Assyria <S%H804><s%>; like as it was to Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he came up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
